item.title: Merging Multiple PDF Files as a Single PDF File using Google Apps Script
item.description: Gists This is a sample script for merging multiple PDF files as a single PDF file using Google Apps Script. In this sample script, pdf-lib is used. In the current stage, it seems that this Javascript can be directly used with Google Apps Script. Sample script As a sample situation, please put multiple PDF files in your Google Drive. This sample merges those PDF files as a single PDF file.
